product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or partial withdrawal is allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life Supreme (Gold Variant) is a one-stop ULIP designed to help achieve multiple life goals such as education, home and retirement, by combining market-linked returns with life protection, loyalty additions, and return of mortality charges.
key_highlights: Loyalty Additions start from 16th policy year onwards
Systematic Partial Withdrawals after lock-in to create second income
Settlement Option available for maturity payout (up to 5 years)
Whole Life policy term option available

plan_variants.variant_name: Gold Variant (One variant under Bajaj Life Supreme)

core_benefits.details: Fund Value payable on maturity date if Life Assured is alive. Policyholder can choose lump sum or installments via Settlement Option.
Higher of (a) Prevailing Sum Assured including top-up sum assured, (b) Fund Value, (c) Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of Total Premiums Paid including top-ups.
core_benefits.guarantee: Minimum 105% of total premiums paid till date of death.
core_benefits.policy_termination: Policy terminates on date of intimation of death.

core_benefits.start: From end of 16th policy year till policy term end (every year)
core_benefits.rate: 0.25% of average fund value of last 3 years (including current year)

core_benefits.details: 100% of mortality charges deducted are added back to the fund value in milestones.

schedule.end_of_15th_year: 100% of mortality charges deducted till year 15
schedule.every_5_years_after_15: 100% of mortality charges deducted in last 5 years
schedule.at_maturity: 100% of mortality charges deducted minus charges already returned

core_benefits.details: Second income option through systematic withdrawals available only after completion of 5-year lock-in period.

eligibility_and_parameters.maximum_premium: No limit (subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)

charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly based on age, gender, sum assured and underwriting policy.

sample_illustrations.note: Returns at 4% and 8% are illustrative, not guaranteed.

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI regulations.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits applicable under Section 80C and 10(10D) (old regime). Consult tax advisor.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_guardrails.rebate_warning: Prohibition of rebate as per Section 41 of Insurance Act, 1938.
compliance_guardrails.misstatement_clause: Fraud and misstatement dealt under Section 45 of Insurance Act.
compliance_guardrails.gst_note: GST depends on policyholder communication address.

retrieval_chunks.text: Death benefit is higher of Sum Assured, Fund Value, or guaranteed 105% of premiums paid including top-ups.
Loyalty additions start from the 16th policy year and add 0.25% of average fund value every year till maturity.
100% mortality charges deducted are returned at year 15, every 5 years after, and at maturity if policy is in force.
Premium allocation charge is nil for base premium, policy administration charge capped at ₹500/month, FMC up to 1.35%.
Entry age is 0–60 (regular/limited) and up to 70 (single pay). Policy terms include 15–40 years and Whole Life.
